text: phir aapake paas gyaan aa jaane ke pashchaat koee aapase eesa ke vishay mein vivaad kare, to kaho ki aao, ham apane putron tatha tumhaare putron aur apanee striyon tatha tumhaaree striyon ko bulaate hain aur svayan ko bhee, phir allaah se savinay praarthana karen ki allaah kee dhikkaar mithyaavaadiyon par[1] ho
